invalid_password: Neno la siri lazima iwe na (herufi, namaba au alama) 8, herufi ndogo, herufi kubwa na alama

invalid_number_gte: Namba lazima iwe kubwa kuliko au sawa na {{n}}
invalid_number_lte: Namba lazima iwe ndogo au sawa na {{n}}

invalid_end: Hii sehemu au nyanja lazima iishie na {{end}
invalid_name_ID: Duh! {{nameID}} haipo. Labda ipo kwenye account nyingine
invalid_selected_account: lazima uchague akaunti yenye akiba zaidi ya {{amountInNEAR}} NEAR

invalid_account_or_not_active: Akaunti ya mpokeaji sio sahihi au haipo

networkMismatchDescription: Ombi hili linategemea mtandao tofauti. Tafadhali badili mtandao wako wa sasa kwenda mwingine kuweza kuona taarifa za maombi

invalidSignerRequest: Ombi la mwenye saini sio sahihi
errorSecurityQuiz: Umejibu swali moja au zaidi vibaya. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye. Kumbuka, uthibitishaji huu ni kwa usalama wako mwenyewe.
